message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to start our negotiation. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1400000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget and the value of the product to me, I would like to propose an offer of $1350000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $1350000. Considering the value of the product to me, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1380000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me and the value you've placed on it.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your position and am willing to increase my offer to $1375000. This brings us closer to a mutually beneficial agreement while still respecting the value I place on the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $1375000. Considering the value of the product to me, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1395000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me and the value you've placed on it.

I appreciate your continued negotiation, Alice. In light of our discussions, I am willing to offer $1385000 for the product. This offer reflects a compromise between our respective positions and aims to reach a fair agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $1385000. Considering the value of the product to me, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1410000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me and the value you've placed on it.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I understand your perspective, and I am willing to consider $1400000 as a final offer for the product. I hope this proposal allows us to reach a satisfactory agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $1400000. Considering the value of the product to me, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $1420000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me and the value you've placed on it.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I have carefully considered our negotiations, and I am willing to offer $1415000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our respective values.
